name: .PRO File Extension
summary: Learn about .PRO files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A PRO file is a website or mobile application mockup created by Adobe Proto, a discontinued Adobe Touch app. It contains one or more webpage or mobile app UI layouts, each of which may include interactive elements. PRO files support CSS, WebKit, and jQuery technologies.

content: Before developers and UI designers begin developing a website or mobile application, they first create digital mockups of what that website or app will look like. These mockups often include a number of sample screens, as well as navigation elements that allow users to navigate between the screens.

PRO files are website or mobile application mockups created by Adobe Proto, a discontinued UI prototyping app that was available for tablets. PRO files were often uploaded to Adobe Creative Cloud, for use in desktop web design applications like Adobe Dreamweaver. Adobe Proto was replaced by Adobe XD.

instructions: If you want to view the website or mobile app mockup a PRO file contains, you can open the file in your web browser. The PRO file will appear as a standard webpage, which you can interact with using the file's interactive elements.
You can also open PRO files in Adobe Dreamweaver (Windows, Mac). This will allow you to edit the mockup your PRO file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
